items.name: static let invert: PDFAnnotationHighlightingMode
items.desc: A highlight mode that inverts the content of the annotation.

items.name: static let none: PDFAnnotationHighlightingMode
items.desc: A highlight mode that doesn’t change the appearance of the annotation.

items.name: static let outline: PDFAnnotationHighlightingMode
items.desc: A highlight mode that inverts the annotation’s border.

items.name: static let push: PDFAnnotationHighlightingMode
items.desc: A highlight mode that renders a pressed appearance for the annotation.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a highlight mode using the specified raw string value.
